abstract: Walmart denied the accusations and said it would defend itself, asserting that its actions were “legal and justified.”
snippet: Walmart denied the accusations and said it would defend itself, asserting that its actions were “legal and justified.”
lead_paragraph: Walmart illegally disciplined and fired employees over strikes and protests, the National Labor Relations Board said on Monday.

headline.main: Labor Panel Finds Illegal Punishments at Walmart
headline.print_headline: Labor Panel Finds Illegal Punishments At Walmart
